summary: The Boeing 777, also known as the Triple Seven, is a large passenger airplane. It is the biggest twin-engine plane in the world and the most-produced wide-body airliner. Boeing designed it to replace older planes and fill the gap between their 767 and 747 models. The 777 first flew in 1994 and entered service in 1995. It can carry up to 368 passengers and fly very long distances, up to 9,840 miles. The plane has unique features like large engines and a circular fuselage. Over time, newer versions with better range and technology were introduced. As of 2024, it has had over 2,200 orders and is mainly used by Emirates.
title: Boeing 777
